ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Working in a corporation, I would have to disagree with you. And I d say real life has it s levels too..  :) Examples: Level 15 - Apprentice Driver s
ygData.messageBody:
> Real life isn't level-based.

Working in a corporation, I would have to disagree with you.
And I'd say real life has it's levels too.. :) Examples:

Level 15 - Apprentice Driver's License
Level 16 - Driver's License
Level 18 - Adult License
Level 21 - Drinking License
Level 65 - Retirement License

> here has been stimulating, it's all pointless if Verant never
> sees it. There's not much to gain arguing it with us.

That pretty much says that most of the things argued or
discussed on this list are pointless. If nothing else,
it makes us all feel better to be able to vent and know
that other people feel the same way and agree, or even
have other people such as yourself, with intelligent
comments on the other side of the view. Sometimes, I
even find such comments change my mind and make me see
things I disliked in a different way.

However, this hasn't happened on the bind issue.
